About.paragraph: With over 20 years of coaching experience across gymnastics, personal training, and running, I bring a holistic approach to helping athletes achieve their goals. I hold a certification from the Road Runners Club of America (RRCA) and have a deep understanding of the sport, having competed in cross country at the collegiate level.
About.paragraph2: My coaching philosophy centers around breaking down larger goals into manageable, achievable pieces. I believe in looking at the whole athlete, ensuring that training programs are tailored to individual needs and promote overall well-being. Whether you're a beginner looking to complete your first 5K or an experienced runner aiming for a personal best, I am committed to helping you reach your potential in a fun and supportive environment.

text.description: Receive a custom training plan tailored to your goals and current fitness level. We will discuss your goals and fitness level and you will receive the full plan up front.
Perfect for athletes who want a personalized plan, need a little guidance on where to start and don't require frequent communication.
Feel free to email your questions to me at anytime!
Enjoy a tailored training plan with unlimited updates to keep you on track. We will discuss your goals and fitness level and you will updated plans weekly.
Benefit from check-ins every week to ensure you're progressing smoothly and to address any challenges you may face.
Your plan will be updated as often as needed to match your evolving goals and progress.

Features.title: Personalized Plans
Features.text: Running plans personalized to where you are in your running journey

Features.title: Weekly Schedules
Features.text: Plans will be updated weekly based on feedback from previous week

Features.title: Check-Ins
Features.text: Regular checkins based on your preferences

Features.title: Goal Planning
Features.text: Goal planning sessions to ensure we are on the same page
